attributes.action: Tax breaks for employees using Public Transport to travel to/from work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of the 'Green' agenda, and to reduce the volume of cars on our roads, why can't the Chancellor look at some way of giving tax incentives to people who use public transport to travel too work??

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
